title: Sapphire
description: A sapphire is a precious gemstone that is a variety of corundum. It is typically blue in color. Sapphires are known for their beauty, durability, and high value.

title: Ruby
description: A ruby is a precious gemstone that is a variety of corundum. It is typically red in color. Rubies are known for their intense color and high value.

title: Emerald
description: An emerald is a precious gemstone that is a variety of beryl. It is typically green in color. Emeralds are known for their deep green color and high value.

title: Diamond
description: A diamond is a precious gemstone that is a form of carbon. It is typically colorless or slightly colored. Diamonds are known for their brilliance and high value.

title: Opal
description: An opal is a precious gemstone that is a form of silica. It is known for its play of color, which is caused by the diffraction of light.

title: Amethyst
description: An amethyst is a semi-precious gemstone that is a variety of quartz. It is typically purple in color. Amethysts are known for their calming properties and beauty.

title: Citrine
description: A citrine is a semi-precious gemstone that is a variety of quartz. It is typically yellow in color. Citrines are known for their cheerful color and positive energy.

title: Topaz
description: A topaz is a semi-precious gemstone that is a silicate mineral. It can be found in a variety of colors, including blue, yellow, and pink. Topaz is known for its brilliance and hardness.

title: Garnet
description: A garnet is a semi-precious gemstone that is a silicate mineral. It can be found in a variety of colors, including red, green, and orange. Garnets are known for their deep color and durability.

title: Peridot
description: A peridot is a semi-precious gemstone that is a silicate mineral. It is typically green in color. Peridots are known for their vibrant green color and calming energy.
